data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: great, important, big, regard, honour, mighty, glorious, a man of moment, All-mighty, All-glorious, grievous, bounty/abounding, magnify/increase. azzama - to make great
data.sentence: The word عَظِيمًا comes from the root ع ظ م and is associated with the meanings: great, important, big, regard, honour, mighty, glorious, a man of moment, All-mighty, All-glorious, grievous, bounty/abounding, magnify/increase. azzama - to make great
The word أَجْرًا comes from the root ا ج ر and is associated with the meanings: recompense/compensation/reward, hire/pay/wage for service, profit

data.meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake
data.sentence: The word لَءَاتَيْنَاهُمْ comes from the root ا ت ي and is associated with the meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake

data.meanings: At; near; with; from; presence; in the presence of; for. Ladun: Particle of a place or preposition.Ladai/Lida = At; near; with; from; presence; in the presence of; for. A particle of place or preposition. The meanings of Ladun and Ladai and Lida are the same.
data.sentence: The word لَدُنَّا comes from the root ل د ن and is associated with the meanings: At; near; with; from; presence; in the presence of; for. Ladun: Particle of a place or preposition.Ladai/Lida = At; near; with; from; presence; in the presence of; for. A particle of place or preposition. The meanings of Ladun and Ladai and Lida are the same.
